mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(memberno, id, passwd, name, gender, birthday, phone, addr_code, addr_detail, joindate, status) VALUES (member_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{phone}, #{addr_code}, #{addr_detail}, #{joindate}, #{status}
mapper.select: SELECT memberno, id, passwd, name, gender, birthday, phone, addr_code, addr_detail, joindate, status FROM member ORDER BY grade ASC, id ASC
